info.institution: School of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Seoul National University
info.occupation: Director of SNU Big Data Institute
info.summary:
Sang Kyun Cha works as a Director of SNU Big Data Institute in School of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Seoul National University, and his\her h-index is 16, g-index is 35. His\Her interests are :
 Database System; Opengis Wrapper; Query Language; Active Rule; Concurrency Control;
